items.description: Agent Skills are portable, open standard, version-controlled folders of instructions, scripts, and resources that agents can discover and load on demand to do tasks more accurately and efficiently. They let agents gain domain expertise, new capabilities, and repeatable workflowsâ€”while making those same skills reusable across different compatible agent products and teams.
